response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs, holds immense value for you at $800,000. Considering its exceptional capabilities and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. I am confident this investment will prove to be a wise decision for your company's growth and success. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to discuss this offer in more detail.", "product_price": 950000}
